task.title: How to Access Zoom Using NCSU's Moodle's Site
task.shortdesc: Zoom can be used for classes or meetings of almost any size! With zoom, you can continue learning during these unprecedented times.

taskbody.context:
Use NCSU's Moodle site to access Zoom.
To create a deliverable-based assignment:

step.cmd: Add an Assignment item to the home page.
Look for Meeting Link Click Link provided.
Use the Cut-off date dropdowns to set the date and time when students may no longer submit the assignment.
Click Submission types and set the ways in which students can submit their work.
Click the Grade tab and type the point value of the assignment into the Maximum grade textbox.
Click the Activity completion tab and click the checkbox beside "Student must submit to this activity to complete it.
Click Save and return to course.
